reviewText: This docudrama - best word for it except it leaves out a caution regarding the absolutely horrendous acting - is a disservice to whatever reality that makes up John Titor.  With 10 mins remaining I started wondering whether the entire TimeTravel_0 was ever a 'thing' that actually happened from 2000-2001, rather than a fabricated (blair witch-esque) hub for this movie.  Were there posts by a TimeTravel_0 and later a man who said his name was John Titor?  This utterly sickening, uhm, docudrama kept spinning me right out of any suspension of disbelief whilst I found myself embarrassed for the actors.  I don't understand why the film makers put the effort in which was required to make this docudrama when they simply could have put together a time frame of John Titor's posts, connecting these with what is going on in the world right now.  The predictions can be said to bear some resemblence to our recent history but to describe the US as having had another civil war is simply laughable, and I cannot imagine that we are on the verge of another World War.
Good and speedy transaction.  Interesting DVD.  Great addition to my library.

started off ok, but quickly degenerated into a silly joke.  I was led to believe there is some serious investigation on titor.  there is much more to this story, but this film only made fun of it.  It is now in the land fill, or it could have been separated out and taken to the incinerators.
